products.title: Ivory Perfect Fit
products.description: This ivory perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Cream Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: This cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Real Wood Almond White Perfect Fit
products.description: The almond white perfect fit works well with tones of grey, mushroom and stone, adding a dash of light cream to a room to balance darker furnishings. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Sandstone White Perfect Fit
products.description: A slightly less intense white than their real wood lightbox white, this sandstone white gives a clean feel to any room. Can be used to make a subtle contrast to white walls, or as a statement piece with other neutral tones. Perfect for windows such as those within conservatories or with protruding handles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Elodie Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Charming and practical, their elodie dove grey roman blind really does have it all. The beautiful blind is soft in texture and has a lovely warm neutral colouring, making it a wonderfully versatile blind. The dove grey is a perfect shade for those wanting to add that some charming and practical, their elodie dove grey roman blind really does have it all.

products.title: Paleo Linen Rustic Blue  Roman Blind
products.description: Deep, dark and classy, this paleo linen rustic blue roman blind will lend an air of effortless sophistication to your space. The perfect shade for adding a little depth to a bright, modern space, or for maximising the relaxing appeal of a more rustic space, this stately blind i deep, dark and classy, this paleo linen rustic blue roman blind will lend an air of effortless sophistication to your space.

products.title: Paleo Linen Ruby Red  Roman Blind
products.description: Stately, refined and with a look as sophisticated as its gemstone namesake, the paleo linen ruby red roman blind is an instant injection of luxury for your decor. The perfect shade to team with deep, dark shades of grey or even black, its ideal for a contemporary space. Cosy t stately, refined and with a look as sophisticated as its gemstone namesake, the paleo linen ruby red roman blind is an instant injection of luxury for your decor.

products.title: Paleo Linen Vapour Grey  Roman Blind
products.description: The deep and earthy shade of this paleo linen vapour grey roman blind brings to mind pebble beaches or natural, rain-washed stone. Its this organic tone that sets this blind apart from its grey counterparts, making it warm and cosy as well as stylish. Combine with bright walls the deep and earthy shade of this paleo linen vapour grey roman blind brings to mind pebble beaches or natural, rain-washed stone.

products.title: Paleo Linen Mustard  Roman Blind
products.description: If you were looking for a vibrant, on-trend way to cover your windows then this paleo linen mustard roman blind is where your search ends. The golden hue and richly textured fabric is warm and cosy, yes, but bright and joyful as a summers afternoon. Its the perfect complement if you were looking for a vibrant, on-trend way to cover your windows then this paleo linen mustard roman blind is where your search ends.

products.title: Paleo Linen Golden Apple  Roman Blind
products.description: Simply delicious, this paleo linen golden apple roman blind radiates fresh, natural appeal. The bright green shade is great for adding as a singular splash of colour as its muted and neutral, but for a more vibrant scheme it can be complemented perfectly with touches of deep simply delicious, this paleo linen golden apple roman blind radiates fresh, natural appeal.

products.title: Paleo Linen Homespun Grey  Roman Blind
products.description: Add a note of rustic charm to a modern space with this paleo linen homespun grey roman blind. The richness of the weave and depth of texture makes this otherwise crisply modern fabric super cosy, swaddling your space in warmth and comfort. On top of that, theres a range of add a note of rustic charm to a modern space with this paleo linen homespun grey roman blind.

products.title: Paleo Linen Sandstone  Roman Blind
products.description: The pale sandy colour of a sun-drenched beach, this simple and beautiful paleo linen sandstone roman blind is a study in straightforward chic. The rich tone radiates a kind of uplifting brightness, the perfect light touch for a space dominated by dark furniture or floors, thoug the pale sandy colour of a sun-drenched beach, this simple and beautiful paleo linen sandstone roman blind is a study in straightforward chic.

products.title: Paleo Linen Teal Wash  Roman Blind
products.description: Easily mistaken for a crisp and contemporary grey, this paleo linen teal wash roman blind is simply stunning. The cool hint of colour enhances the fabric and makes it that much more eye-catching, but the vibe it exudes is still a subtle one. Equally suitable for more rustic or easily mistaken for a crisp and contemporary grey, this paleo linen teal wash roman blind is simply stunning.

products.title: Paleo Linen Pastel Green  Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh and bright, this minty little number is a pretty and subtle splash of lightness for your space. The organic appeal of green gives this blind an uplifting vibe, cheerful and refreshing. In bright and minimalist surroundings this blind will look right at home. The soft fresh and bright, this minty little number is a pretty and subtle splash of lightness for your space.

products.title: Paleo Linen Smoky Blue  Roman Blind
products.description: Dark, imposing and stately, the paleo linen smoky blue roman blind will preside over your decor with the kind of classy chic that speaks of luxury. The subtlest of blue tints colours an otherwise crisp, grey fabric, soft and beautifully textured. Its the perfect complement to dark, imposing and stately, the paleo linen smoky blue roman blind will preside over your decor with the kind of classy chic that speaks of luxury.

products.title: Amore Sandstone Roman Blind
products.description: Add a perfectly neutral touch to your decor alongside some serious style, with this gorgeous amore sandstone roman blind. The versatile hue is a great feature, playing well with almost any other scheme in any space, but theres a distinct note of class and sophistication about add a perfectly neutral touch to your decor alongside some serious style, with this gorgeous amore sandstone roman blind.

products.title: Paleo Linen Damson  Roman Blind
products.description: This sublimely sweet paleo linen roman blind will add pep and vigour to your home. It's a fun and vibrant purple hue that's also incredibly sophisticated. The textured fabric has a lovely linen quality to add weight and a little bit of rustic charm.

products.title: Paleo Linen Ash Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and moody, this paleo linen ash roman blind is perfect for bringing a taste of organic living into your home, while piling up the comfort. The slubbed look is made up of light stone threads alongside the dark slate shade, a tonal affair that is only accentuated by the beaut dark and moody, this paleo linen ash roman blind is perfect for bringing a taste of organic living into your home, while piling up the comfort.

products.title: Paleo Linen Stone Roman Blind
products.description: This paleo linen stone roman blind is a natural beauty, taking wonderful shade and a lovely linen mix texture to deliver a window dressing that finishes your home's scheme with ease. The lighter grey colour keeps this blind feeling airy, whilst having that cosy vibe intertwined, this paleo linen stone roman blind is a natural beauty, taking wonderful shade and a lovely linen mix texture to deliver a window dressing that finishes your home's scheme with ease.

products.title: Lowe Sandstone Roman Blind
products.description: This lowes sandstone roman blind is luxurious and subtle, a metallic twinkle of the fabric and a sweet foliage pattern. The wild style is brought down thanks to the neutral colourway. This blind even has a lustrous finish, grabbing the natural light and bouncing it merrily arou this lowes sandstone roman blind is luxurious and subtle, a metallic twinkle of the fabric and a sweet foliage pattern.

products.title: Paleo Linen Spring Green Roman Blind
products.description: This paleo linen spring green roman blind has nature infused throughout, with a winning combination of linen mix weave and a luscious shade of green. It's just like the vibrant grass of spring. If that wasn't enough, the texture of this blind is perfect for adding a soft touch t this paleo linen spring green roman blind has nature infused throughout, with a winning combination of linen mix weave and a luscious shade of green.
